lyrics:
"Down & Out" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "Down & Out" (feat. Kesha & Peewee Longway) [Hook:] Baby, oh it just pains me To see you down and out Baby, oh it just pains me To see you down and out [PeeWee Longway:] It just pains me when I see my main boo thang Down and out, going through her fucking mood swings You and your bestie having convos about Longway I just landed first class on the runway You feel my Feng Shui, I'm in London bae Racks andale, fuck you mean down and out? You the queen of my house, got shit to be stressing bout On your call and I'm en-route, fuck your bestie talking bout? [Hook:] Baby, oh it just pains me To see you down and out Baby, oh it just pains me To see you down and out [Kesha:] Oh baby, baby just tell me What do you want and I All I got to You ain't gotta say anything Oh I, don't mind, I do any, anything Anything you need [Hook:] Baby, oh it just pains me To see you down and out Baby, oh it just pains me To see you down and out if ( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPod|iPad|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) { document.getElementById('azmxmbanner').style.display='block'; document.write('
